1.name: Park
1.description: A vast green space where the community can enjoy nature, picnics, and outdoor activities.
1.instruction: Please keep the park clean and respect the wildlife.

2.name: Broadcast plaza
2.description: A central hub for live broadcasts, featuring state-of-the-art audio and visual equipment.
2.instruction: Respect the ongoing broadcasts and maintain a quiet environment.

3.name: Casino
3.description: A thrilling hub of gaming and entertainment, offering a wide range of gambling games.
3.instruction: Please gamble responsibly and enjoy our wide selection of games.

4.name: Disco
4.description: A lively venue for dancing, music, and socializing, featuring a vibrant dance floor and bar.
4.instruction: Enjoy the music, respect other dancers, and please drink responsibly.

boss.name: Boss
boss.description: Manage the disco, oversee operations, and ensure a fun and safe environment for guests and staff.

bartender.name: Bartender
bartender.description: Mix and serve drinks to customers, ensuring a fun and lively atmosphere.

dancer.name: Dancer
dancer.description: Entertain guests with your dance moves and energy, creating a vibrant and lively atmosphere.

5.name: Cafe
5.description: A cozy spot for coffee, pastries, and light meals. A perfect place for casual meetings or relaxing alone.
5.instruction: Please order at the counter and be considerate of other guests.

boss.name: Boss
boss.description: Manage the cafe, oversee operations, and ensure a pleasant experience for customers and staff.

6.name: Art plaza
6.description: An open space celebrating creativity with installations, exhibitions, and workshops. People can create their own art to express their extreme emotions or feel the emotions of others.
6.instruction: Feel free to explore the art, participate in workshops, and respect the exhibits.

7.name: Communication plaza
7.description: A hub for information exchange and presentations, equipped with modern communication technology.
7.instruction: Please use the facilities respectfully and keep noise to a minimum.

8.name: Playground
8.description: A fun and safe outdoor area for children to play, featuring various playground equipment.
8.instruction: Please supervise children at all times and respect the play area.

9.name: Church
9.description: A place of worship and spiritual reflection, providing wedding officiating services
9.instruction: Please respect the sanctity of the church and the beliefs of others.

10.name: Hospital
10.description: A medical facility providing healthcare services, including diagnosis, treatment, and surgery.
10.instruction: Please follow the instructions of medical staff and respect the privacy of patients.

11.name: Goverment office
11.description: A center for administrative services, like recylcing artworks and release of relief funds.
11.instruction: Please go to the office desk and follow the rules and regulations.
